name: Single Family
description: Occupied by one family group or extended family.

name: Duplex
description: Residential building divided into sections with each section having a separate entrance.

name: Apartment Building
description: Residential housing with common entrance areas.

name: Multi Family Low Rise
description: Apartment Buildings not more than 3 stories.

name: Gated Community
description: Housing where access is restricted by a common gate and walls for security and privacy.

name: Planned Community
description: Housing reserved for older adults still having the ability for self-care.

name: Public Housing
description: Federal, State or locally funded in part or wholly by tax payers for low income families.
